00258 
00260 void f_AN(double cal_t[], double cal_AN[], double rho, double sigma, double Imr5, double Rer5, double scale)
00261 {
00262    int i;
00263    double mb2GeV_inv2 = 0.389379; // 1GeV-2=0.389mb factor to convert mb to GeV
00264    double beta = 0;
00265    double delta = 0.02;
00266    double delta_t = ((5E-2) - (1E-4)) / (double)256;
00267 
00268    double sigma_totP = sigma / mb2GeV_inv2;
00269 
00270    double tc = -8 * TMath::Pi() * ALPHA / (sigma_totP * sqrt(1 + rho * rho));
00271 
00272    for (i = 0; i < 256; ++i) {
00273       cal_t[i] = 0.5E-3 + delta_t * i;
00274 
00275       double tt = -1 * tc / cal_t[i];
00276       double ttt = tt * tt - 2 * (rho + delta) * tt + (1 + rho * rho) * (1 + beta * beta);
00277       double ans = tt * ((MAGMOM_PROTON - 1) * (1 - delta * rho) - 2 * (Imr5 - delta * Rer5)) - 2 * (Rer5 - rho * Imr5);
00278 
00279       cal_AN[i] = scale * ans * sqrt(cal_t[i]) / (double)(ttt * MASS_PROTON);
00280    }
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00285 Double_t modelAN(Double_t *x, Double_t *par)
00286 {
00287    double minus_t = x[0];
00288 
00289    double Rer5 = par[0];
00290    double Imr5 = par[1];
00291 
00292    double mb2GeV_inv2 = 0.389379;          // 1GeV-2    = 0.389mb
00293 
00294    // sqrt(s) = 21.9 GeV, 255 GeV beam on H-jet target
00295    double B          = 12;
00296    double rho        = -0.0123;
00297    double sigma_totP = 39.245;
00298 
00299    double Lambda2 = 0.71;      //GeV^2
00300    double gamma   = 0.5772156;
00301    double kappa   = MAGMOM_PROTON - 1; // anomalous magnetic moment of proton
00302 
00303    sigma_totP /= mb2GeV_inv2;
00304 
00305    double delta = ALPHA*TMath::Log( 2./ minus_t / (B + 8./Lambda2) ) - ALPHA*gamma ;
00306    double tc    = -8 * TMath::Pi() * ALPHA / sigma_totP ;
00307    double tt    = -1 * tc / minus_t;
00308    double denom = tt * tt - 2 * (rho + delta) * tt + (1 + rho * rho);     // * (1 + beta * beta);
00309    double nom   = tt * (kappa * (1 - delta * rho) + 2 * (delta * Rer5 - Imr5)) - 2 * (Rer5 - rho * Imr5);
00310 
00311    return TMath::Sqrt(minus_t) * nom / MASS_PROTON / denom;
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00316 TFitResultPtr FitGraph(TGraph *gr, TF1 *func, TEllipse *ell)
00317 {
00318    Info("FitGraph", "\n********************************************************************************\n");
00319 
00320    TFitResultPtr fitRes = gr->Fit(func, "R S B");
00321 
00322    double Rer5     = func->GetParameter(0);
00323    double Rer5_err = func->GetParError(0);
00324    double Imr5     = func->GetParameter(1);
00325    double Imr5_err = func->GetParError(1);
00326    Double_t corr   = 0;
00327 
00328    if (fitRes.Get()) {
00329       TMatrixDSym covMatrix  = fitRes->GetCovarianceMatrix();
00330       covMatrix.Print();
00331       TMatrixDSym corrMatrix = fitRes->GetCorrelationMatrix();
00332       corrMatrix.Print();
00333 
00334       Rer5     = fitRes->Value(0);
00335       Rer5_err = fitRes->ParError(0);
00336       Imr5     = fitRes->Value(1);
00337       Imr5_err = fitRes->ParError(1);
00338 
00339       corr = corrMatrix[0][1];
00340    }
00341 
00342    ValErrPair par1(Rer5, Rer5_err);
00343    ValErrPair par2(Imr5, Imr5_err);
00344 
00345    TEllipse* ellTmp = utils::GetErrorEllipse(par1, par2, corr);
00346 
00347    ellTmp->Copy(*ell);
00348    delete ellTmp;
00349 
00350    if (ell)
00351       ell->Print();
00352    else
00353       Error("plotAN", "Invalid ellipse");
00354 
00355    Double_t r5     = sqrt(Rer5*Rer5 + Imr5*Imr5);
00356    Double_t r5_err = sqrt(  Rer5_err*Rer5_err + Imr5_err*Imr5_err + 2*corr * Rer5_err * Imr5_err);
00357 
00358    printf("\n");
00359    printf("corr   = % 10.8lf\n", corr);
00360    printf("Re(r5) = % 10.8lf +/- % 10.8lf\n", Rer5, Rer5_err);
00361    printf("Im(r5) = % 10.8lf +/- % 10.8lf\n", Imr5, Imr5_err);
00362    printf("   r5  = % 10.8lf +/- % 10.8lf\n",   r5,   r5_err);
00363    printf("\n");
00364 
00365    return fitRes;
00366 }
